intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to Warmly. By using our application, you agree to these Terms of Service. Please read them carefully before using our services. Warmly is a professional networking application designed to help you manage and grow your professional relationships.

account.title: 2. Account Terms
account.content: You must be at least 18 years old to use this service. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. You are responsible for all activities that occur under your account. You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account.

acceptableUse.title: 3. Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use Warmly for any unlawful purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, or impair the service. You must not attempt to gain unauthorized access to any part of the service. You agree not to upload any malicious content or spam. You must respect other users' privacy and intellectual property rights.

ip.title: 4. Intellectual Property
ip.content: Warmly and its original content, features, and functionality are owned by Warmly and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You retain ownership of the data you upload to Warmly, but grant us a license to use this data to provide the service.

termination.title: 5. Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time, with or without cause, with or without notice. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease. You may also delete your account at any time through the app settings.

disclaimer.title: 6. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: The service is provided "as is" and "as available" without any warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free. We are not responsible for any introductions or professional relationships that result from using the service.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: In no event shall Warmly, its directors, employees, or agents be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or relating to your use of the service. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service in the past 12 months.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the application. Your continued use of the service after such modifications constitutes your acceptance of the updated terms.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at support@mywarmly.app.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At Warmly, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application. Please read this policy carefully to understand our practices regarding your personal data.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, including: your name, email address, and profile information; contact information you add to the app (names, companies, phone numbers, emails); relationship data and notes you create; interaction history you log. We also automatically collect device information, usage data, and analytics to improve our service.

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your information to: provide and maintain the Warmly service; personalize your experience and provide AI-powered features; send you important updates about the service; respond to your inquiries and provide customer support; analyze usage patterns to improve our service; comply with legal obligations.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Security
storage.content: Your data is stored securely on our servers. We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with: service providers who assist in operating our application; legal authorities when required by law; other parties with your explicit consent. When you use the Teams feature, you control what contact information is shared with team members.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to: access the personal data we hold about you; request correction of inaccurate data; request deletion of your data; export your data in a portable format; withdraw consent for data processing; opt out of marketing communications. To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@mywarmly.app.

security.title: 7. Security Measures
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including: encrypted data transmission (HTTPS/TLS); secure password storage using bcrypt hashing; regular security audits and updates; access controls and authentication. We encourage you to use a strong, unique password for your Warmly account.

children.title: 8. Children's Privacy
children.content: Warmly is not intended for use by anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete that information.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the new policy in the app and updating the "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this policy periodically.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at privacy@mywarmly.app.

support.title: Help & Support
support.subtitle: We're here to help you get the most out of Warmly

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: Have a question, found a bug, or need help with something? Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

q1.question: How do I add a new contact?
q1.answer: You can add contacts by scanning a business card, using the quick note feature with natural language, or manually entering contact details from the dashboard.

q2.question: How does the AI-powered card scanning work?
q2.answer: Simply point your camera at a business card and our AI will automatically extract the contact information including name, company, title, email, and phone number.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Yes, we take security seriously. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest. You can read more about our security practices in our Privacy Policy.

q4.question: How do I delete my account?
q4.answer: You can delete your account from your profile settings. This will permanently remove all your data from our servers.

response.title: Response Time
response.content: We typically respond to support inquiries within 24-48 hours during business days. For urgent issues, please include 'URGENT' in your email subject.
